text: Next update: As data becomes available
SEARCH VIA THE TOPIC COLUMN OR BY USING COMMAND F (similar to the Audience Power Stats Tab)

PURCHASE CONSIDERATION & MORE AMONGST OT FANS PROVEN INFLUENCE \n(links to SMH) Topic Data point Source Proven Influence - apparel/sneakers saner Ad impact (QSR) OT fans are 2x more likely to dine/purchase from a fast food restaurant after seeing an ad from them Overtime Audience Study on QSR and Dining, 2023 Proven Influence - auto Ad impact (Apparel/Sneakers) 6 in 10 OT fans are more interested in AND more likely to purchase something from an apparel or sneaker brand after seeing it advertise with Overtime Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024 Ad impact (Auto) Over 70% of OT fans are more interested AND more likely to purchase / lease a vehicle from an auto brand if they saw it working with Overtime Overtime Audience Study on Auto, 2025 Ad impact (Grocery Stores) OT fans are nearly 3x more likely to be more interested and more likely to purchase something from a grocery when they see it advertising with Overtime Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, 2024 Ad impact (HIVE/PULSE) 70% of our audience agree that they have a better opinion of a brand AND are more likely to purchase something from a brand when they see the same ad coming through the Overtime handle versus the brand partner's handle Overtime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2024 Alcoholic Beverages 66% of OT fans are more likely to purchase an alcoholic beverage when they see it advertising with Overtime (346 index) Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, 2024 Alcoholic Beverages When purchasing alcoholic beverages, price is the number one factor (67%), followed by taste (63%) and alcohol content (54%) Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, 2024 Proven Influence - alc/bev Talent will be on-the-ground at key tentpoles throughout the year, covering these moments in a way that only OT can! Alcoholic Beverages OT fans typically purchase alcoholic beverages at liquor stores (67%), grocery stores (62%) and bars/pubs (49%) Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, 2024 Proven Influence - insurance (home and auto) Slide Alcoholic Beverages OT fans are 3x more likely than Gen Pop to purchase alcohol at sporting events, where beer is the drink of choice among OT fans when watching sports Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, 2024 Athlete Impact OT fans are 4x more likely to agree that "When I see a brand work with an athlete or influencer, it makes me more interested in the brand." Overtime Audience Study 2024 Proven Influence - beverage Slide Auto Over 60% of OT fans plan to purchase or lease a vehicle in the next year, which is 2.2x more likely than Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Auto, 2025 Proven Influence - convenience store Slide Auto Nearly 4 in 5 OT fans plan to purchase or lease a NEW vehicle rather than a used or CPO Overtime Audience Study on Auto, 2025 Proven Influence - cosmetics Slide Auto When deciding what vehicle to purchase or lease, OT fans care about it fitting their needs, maintenance and reliability, and feeling safe to drive Overtime Audience Study on Auto, 2025 Proven Influence - CPG - snacks Slide Auto OT fans care more about a vehicle being eco-friendly (171 index), having smart tech (155 index), and feels fun to drive (149 index) than Gen Pop when purchasing or leasing a vehicle Overtime Audience Study on Auto, 2025 Back to School (Amount Spent) OT fans are willing to spend more money when they go back to school: nearly in 6 in 10 are likely to spend $200 or more Overtime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023 Proven Influence - fantasy sports Slide Back to School (Apparel) 85% of OT fans plan to purchase apparel/clothing when they go back to school Overtime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023 Proven Influence - fast casual dining Slide Back to School (Headphones) 57% of OT fans plan to purchase headphones when they go back to school, where 62% of those fans plan to purchase Apple headphones Overtime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023 Proven Influence - financial services Slide Back to School (Shoes) 87% of OT fans plan to purchase shoes/sneakers when they go back to school, where 65% plan to purchase Nike shoes Overtime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023 Proven Influence - footwear Slide Back to School (Shopping) OT fans are most likely to shop at retail stores (such as Target or Walmart) when shopping for back to school items (53%) Overtime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023 Proven Influence - grooming Slide Back to School (Shopping) While OT fans are most likely to be influenced by social media when back to school shopping, athletes are over 3x more likely to influence them Overtime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023 Betting 75% of OT fans like placing live bets, and over half of fans typically bet money line or on parlays Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), 2025 Betting OT fans are 2.4x more likely to spend over $50 on each sports bet they place Overtime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), 2025 Brand Impact 78% of OT fans agree that when they see a brand working with Overtime, it makes them more interested in buying from the brand Overtime Audience Study 2024 Proven Influence - health Slide Brand Impact 75% of OT fans agree that when they see a brand working with Overtime, they have a higher opinion of the brand Overtime Audience Study 2024 Proven Influence - pizza Slide Brand Impact 85% of OT fans agree that “When a brand aligns with the same things that I stand for, I am more likely to purchase something from it.” (155 index) Overtime Audience Study 2024 Proven Influence - qsr Slide Candy OT fans are 2x more likely to purchase candy at sporting events (199 index) or online (213 index) as compared to Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Candy and Chocolate, 2023 Proven Influence - streaming Slide Candy & Chocolate OT fans are most likely to purchase candy and chocolate from retail or convenience stores (about 7 in 10 OT Fans) Overtime Audience Study on Candy and Chocolate, 2023 Proven Influence - tech Slide Chocolate OT fans are 2x to 3x more likely to purchase chocolate at sporting events (287 index) or online (213 index) as compared to Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Candy and Chocolate, 2023 Cryptocurrency 75% of OT fans are interested in investing in cryptocurrency Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025 Coffee OT fans are 2x as likely to purchase their coffee or tea by ordering ahead via mobile app Overtime Audience Study on Coffee/Tea, 2022 Cosmetics OT females are more likely to spend over $50 a month on cosmetics (229 index) Overtime Audience Study on Cosmetics, 2023 Cosmetics 81% of OT females purchase cosmetics products after seeing them on social media Overtime Audience Study on Cosmetics, 2023 CPG When OT fans see an ad for a personal care brand on social media, 84% are more interested in purchasing something from that brand Overtime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2024 CPG When purchasing a personal care product or laundry detergent, quality is the most important factor (63%) followed by price (15%) and sustainability (11%) Overtime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2024 CPG In the next month, OT fans are most likely to purchase deodorant (81%), hair care products (79%) or cleansing products (76%) Overtime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2024 Delivery apps When selecting what delivery app to use, price is the #1 factor that OT fans take into account Overtime Audience Study on QSR and Dining, 2023 Factors When making a purchase, quality is the most important factor to OT fans Overtime Audience Study 2024 Factors Outside of quality, price and research also influence OT fans' purchase decisions Overtime Audience Study 2024 Fast Casual Restaurants OT fans are 2x more likely to spend over $30 per person at fast casual restaurants Overtime Audience Study on QSR and Dining, 2023 Finance OT fans are most likely to spend their money on food/drinks (55%), clothes (40%) and personal care (43%), but over-index most on sports events (380 index) and concerts (186 index) Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025 Finance 78% of OT fans are more likely to use a financial service when they see it working with Overtime Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025 Gaming OT gamers are 2x more likely than Gen Pop to spend over $250 a year on gaming (including games, consoles, controllers, and more) Overtime Audience Study on Gaming, 2023 Gaming Consoles While 93% of OT gamers currently own a gaming device, over 1/4 plan on purchasing one or upgrading their current devices oon Overtime Audience Study on Gaming, 2023 Grocery Shopping 65% of OT fans like to shop at multiple stores, shopping at an average of over 4 different grocery stores, 1.6x more than Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, 2024 Grocery Shopping 64% of OT fans spend over $250 per month on groceries for their household, where nearly half of those fans spend over $500 per month Overtime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, 2024 Grooming Male OT fans are 1.8x more likely to spend more on nicer grooming products Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025 Holiday Over half of Overtime fans are likely to spend over $500 on gifts, a 163 index to Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024 Holiday Video games, clothing, electronics, sneakers, games are the five most popular items that OT fans are likely to purchase this holiday season Overtime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024 Holiday OT fans overindex most on purchasing sports equipment (327 index), sports memorabilia & merchandise (302 index) and charitable donations (260 index) Overtime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024 Holiday 85% of OT fans looks for the best deals when holiday shopping, where quality and price are the most important factors Overtime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024 Investing 76% of OT fans are at least moderately knowledgeable about investing, where nearly half are investing between $25K and $100K each year Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025 Juice While 8 in 10 OT fans purchase juice at a grocery store, they are over 3.5x more likely to purchase it online (355 index) Overtime Audience Study on Beverages, 2023 Parenting OT Parents are most likely to purchase clothes/sneakers, video games, or snacks for their children (8 in 10) Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, 2024 Payment Methods OT fans are most likely to use credit cards (52%) and debit cards (51%) when paying for things Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025 Payment Methods OT fans are frequent users of digital payment methods, and plan to use them in the future, where the most popular systems include PayPal (85%), Cash App (74%) and Google Pay (68%) Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025 Payment Methods OT fans are more likely than Gen Pop to use Buy Now, Pay Later platforms, where Afterpay (55%, 277 index), Klara (47%, 312 index) and Affirm (45%, 288 index) are most commonly used Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025 Personal Care OT fans are nearly 3.5x more likely to spend over $100 per month on personal care products Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025 Personal Care Over 7 in 10 OT fans tend to purchase the same personal care products, rather than trying new ones Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025 Personal Care OT fans are over 4.6x more likely to shop for personal care products via social media, but over 75% tend to do most of their shopping at Walmart, Target, or Amazon Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025 Personal Care 72% of OT fans would be more interested in a personal care brand or product if they saw it working with Overtime Overtime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025 Podcasts OT fans are very likely to consider purchasing products & services from hearing about them through podcast advertising, a 338 index compared to Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Podcasts, 2023 Pre-Packaged Food & Beverages OT fans are nearly 3x more likely than Gen Pop to purchase pre-packaged food and beverages in person, although 70% typically purchase in-person Overtime Audience Study on Pre-Packaged Food & Beverages, 2025 QSR 71% of OT fans spend under $30 per person at fast food restaurants Overtime Audience Study on QSR and Dining, 2023 QSR (Pizza) 89% of OT fans purchase pizza at least a few times per month; 53% purchase pizza at least once a week Overtime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2023 Retail 82% of OT fans are the primary shopper for their apparel, shoes, and accessories Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024 Retail Over 8 in 10 OT fans shop for apparel monthly (175 index to Gen Pop) Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024 Retail Approximately 6 in 10 OT fans spend over $100 per month each on apparel and shoes, which is 1.5-2x more than Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024 Seltzer 70% of OT fans typically purchase seltzer/sparkling water at a grocery store Overtime Audience Study on Beverages, 2023 Shoes OT fans are 3.5x more likely to shop for shoes monthly as compared to Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024 Shopping Walmart is the #1 place for OT fans to shop for discount items, where 3/4 of fans go to Walmart multiple times a month Overtime Audience Study on Walmart, 2022 Shopping OT fans are 2x more likely to purchase products recommended by influencers or athletes (207 index) Overtime Audience Study on Shopping, 2025 Shopping 3 in 5 OT fans say that their family and friends look to them for recommendations for what to purchase Overtime Audience Study on Shopping, 2025 Snacks 84% of OT fans shop for snacks weekly, where grocery stores are the #1 place to purchase snacks Overtime Audience Study on Snacks, 2024 Snacks OT fans are nearly 2x more likely than Gen Pop to purchase a snack when they see it advertised in sports Overtime Audience Study on Snacks, 2024 Snacks 91% of OT fans agree that when they find a certain snack they like, they keep buying it Overtime Audience Study on Snacks, 2024 Snacks x Children OT parents are most likely to purchase fruit (89%), chips (84%) or fruit snacks (83%) for their children Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, 2024 Social Media Purchases OT fans are over 7.5x more likely to purchase products through social media weekly or more often (754 index) Overtime Audience Study 2024 Soda OT fans are 2.5x more likely to purchase soda online, and 1.7x more likely to purchase it at a sporting event, as compared to Gen Pop Overtime Audience Study on Beverages, 2023 Sports/Energy Drinks 68% of OT fans typically purchase sports or energy drinks at convenience stores, which is the #1 location where these beverages are purchased Overtime Audience Study on Beverages, 2023 Streaming 63% of OT fans subscribe to 3 or more streaming services on their own Overtime Audience Study on Streaming, 2024 Streaming Price is the number one factor that influences OT fans when picking a streaming service, followed by TV Show/Movie availability and quality; OT fans are 3x more likely to pick one based on the ability to watch sports Overtime Audience Study on Streaming, 2024 Streaming 91% of OT fans would be likely to try a streaming service if it offered a discounted price Overtime Audience Study on Streaming, 2024 Tech The top 3 contributing factors in purchasing tech products for OT fans are the features, price, and compatibility with other devices; but 35% of OT fans care about the Brand Name (135 index) Overtime Audience Study on Tech, 2022 Tech 67% of fans typically stick to the same brands when purchasing tech products Overtime Audience Study on Tech, 2025 Tech 7 in 10 OT fans influence their family and friends regarding what tech products they should purchase Overtime Audience Study on Tech, 2025 Tech 2 in 3 OT fans are likely to purchase the latest and greatest technology Overtime Audience Study on Tech, 2025 Tech OT fans are +53% more likely to spend more on the latest and greatest technology Overtime Audience Study on Tech, 2025 Telco 75% of OT fans have their own cell phone plan and pay for it themselves Overtime Audience Study on Telco, 2024 Ticketing 76% of OT fans purchase their tickets at least a month to a few months in advance Overtime Audience Study on Ticketing, 2023 Toys OT parents are most likely to purchase construction toys (LEGOs, blocks) (72%), action figures or dolls (66%), or sports equipment (66%) for their children Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, 2024 Travel OT fans tend to book their travel through online methods, where 71% book via a travel website/app or a brand's website/app Overtime Audience Study on Travel, 2024 Travel 3 in 5 OT fans agree that more airlines should form partnerships with Overtime AND are more interested in flying with an airline if they saw it advertising with Overtime Overtime Audience Study on Travel, 2024 Travel 64% of OT fans think that more hotels should form partnerships with Overtime, where over half are more likely to be interested in staying at a hotel if they saw it advertising with OT Overtime Audience Study on Travel, 2024

PURCHASE CONSIDERATION & MORE AMONGST OT FANSPROVEN INFLUENCE \n(links to SMH)
TopicData pointSourceProven Influence - apparel/sneakerssaner
Ad impact (QSR)OT fans are 2x more likely to dine/purchase from a fast food restaurant after seeing an ad from themOvertime Audience Study on QSR and Dining, 2023Proven Influence - auto
Ad impact (Apparel/Sneakers)6 in 10 OT fans are more interested in AND more likely to purchase something from an apparel or sneaker brand after seeing it advertise with OvertimeOvertime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024
Ad impact (Auto)Over 70% of OT fans are more interested AND more likely to purchase / lease a vehicle from an auto brand if they saw it working with OvertimeOvertime Audience Study on Auto, 2025
Ad impact (Grocery Stores)OT fans are nearly 3x more likely to be more interested and more likely to purchase something from a grocery when they see it advertising with OvertimeOvertime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, 2024
Ad impact (HIVE/PULSE)70% of our audience agree that they have a better opinion of a brand AND are more likely to purchase something from a brand when they see the same ad coming through the Overtime handle versus the brand partner's handleOvertime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2024
Alcoholic Beverages66% of OT fans are more likely to purchase an alcoholic beverage when they see it advertising with Overtime (346 index)Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, 2024
Alcoholic BeveragesWhen purchasing alcoholic beverages, price is the number one factor (67%), followed by taste (63%) and alcohol content (54%)Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, 2024Proven Influence - alc/bevTalent will be on-the-ground at key tentpoles throughout the year, covering these moments in a way that only OT can!
Alcoholic BeveragesOT fans typically purchase alcoholic beverages at liquor stores (67%), grocery stores (62%) and bars/pubs (49%)Overtime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, 2024Proven Influence - insurance (home and auto)Slide
Alcoholic BeveragesOT fans are 3x more likely than Gen Pop to purchase alcohol at sporting events, where beer is the drink of choice among OT fans when watching sportsOvertime Audience Study on Alcoholic Beverages, 2024
Athlete ImpactOT fans are 4x more likely to agree that "When I see a brand work with an athlete or influencer, it makes me more interested in the brand."Overtime Audience Study 2024Proven Influence - beverageSlide
AutoOver 60% of OT fans plan to purchase or lease a vehicle in the next year, which is 2.2x more likely than Gen PopOvertime Audience Study on Auto, 2025Proven Influence - convenience storeSlide
AutoNearly 4 in 5 OT fans plan to purchase or lease a NEW vehicle rather than a used or CPOOvertime Audience Study on Auto, 2025Proven Influence - cosmeticsSlide
AutoWhen deciding what vehicle to purchase or lease, OT fans care about it fitting their needs, maintenance and reliability, and feeling safe to driveOvertime Audience Study on Auto, 2025Proven Influence - CPG - snacksSlide
AutoOT fans care more about a vehicle being eco-friendly (171 index), having smart tech (155 index), and feels fun to drive (149 index) than Gen Pop when purchasing or leasing a vehicleOvertime Audience Study on Auto, 2025
Back to School (Amount Spent)OT fans are willing to spend more money when they go back to school: nearly in 6 in 10 are likely to spend $200 or moreOvertime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023Proven Influence - fantasy sportsSlide
Back to School (Apparel)85% of OT fans plan to purchase apparel/clothing when they go back to schoolOvertime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023Proven Influence - fast casual diningSlide
Back to School (Headphones)57% of OT fans plan to purchase headphones when they go back to school, where 62% of those fans plan to purchase Apple headphonesOvertime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023Proven Influence - financial servicesSlide
Back to School (Shoes)87% of OT fans plan to purchase shoes/sneakers when they go back to school, where 65% plan to purchase Nike shoesOvertime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023Proven Influence - footwearSlide
Back to School (Shopping)OT fans are most likely to shop at retail stores (such as Target or Walmart) when shopping for back to school items (53%)Overtime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023Proven Influence - groomingSlide
Back to School (Shopping)While OT fans are most likely to be influenced by social media when back to school shopping, athletes are over 3x more likely to influence themOvertime Audience Study on Back to School, 2023
Betting75% of OT fans like placing live bets, and over half of fans typically bet money line or on parlaysOvertime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), 2025
BettingOT fans are 2.4x more likely to spend over $50 on each sports bet they placeOvertime Audience Study on Sports Betting (A21+ in legal betting states), 2025
Brand Impact78% of OT fans agree that when they see a brand working with Overtime, it makes them more interested in buying from the brandOvertime Audience Study 2024Proven Influence - healthSlide
Brand Impact75% of OT fans agree that when they see a brand working with Overtime, they have a higher opinion of the brandOvertime Audience Study 2024Proven Influence - pizzaSlide
Brand Impact85% of OT fans agree that “When a brand aligns with the same things that I stand for, I am more likely to purchase something from it.” (155 index)Overtime Audience Study 2024Proven Influence - qsrSlide
CandyOT fans are 2x more likely to purchase candy at sporting events (199 index) or online (213 index) as compared to Gen PopOvertime Audience Study on Candy and Chocolate, 2023Proven Influence - streamingSlide
Candy & ChocolateOT fans are most likely to purchase candy and chocolate from retail or convenience stores (about 7 in 10 OT Fans)Overtime Audience Study on Candy and Chocolate, 2023Proven Influence - techSlide
ChocolateOT fans are 2x to 3x more likely to purchase chocolate at sporting events (287 index) or online (213 index) as compared to Gen PopOvertime Audience Study on Candy and Chocolate, 2023
Cryptocurrency75% of OT fans are interested in investing in cryptocurrencyOvertime Audience Study on Finance, 2025
CoffeeOT fans are 2x as likely to purchase their coffee or tea by ordering ahead via mobile appOvertime Audience Study on Coffee/Tea, 2022
CosmeticsOT females are more likely to spend over $50 a month on cosmetics (229 index)Overtime Audience Study on Cosmetics, 2023
Cosmetics81% of OT females purchase cosmetics products after seeing them on social mediaOvertime Audience Study on Cosmetics, 2023
CPGWhen OT fans see an ad for a personal care brand on social media, 84% are more interested in purchasing something from that brandOvertime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2024
CPGWhen purchasing a personal care product or laundry detergent, quality is the most important factor (63%) followed by price (15%) and sustainability (11%)Overtime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2024
CPGIn the next month, OT fans are most likely to purchase deodorant (81%), hair care products (79%) or cleansing products (76%)Overtime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2024
Delivery appsWhen selecting what delivery app to use, price is the #1 factor that OT fans take into accountOvertime Audience Study on QSR and Dining, 2023
FactorsWhen making a purchase, quality is the most important factor to OT fansOvertime Audience Study 2024
FactorsOutside of quality, price and research also influence OT fans' purchase decisionsOvertime Audience Study 2024
Fast Casual RestaurantsOT fans are 2x more likely to spend over $30 per person at fast casual restaurantsOvertime Audience Study on QSR and Dining, 2023
FinanceOT fans are most likely to spend their money on food/drinks (55%), clothes (40%) and personal care (43%), but over-index most on sports events (380 index) and concerts (186 index)Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025
Finance78% of OT fans are more likely to use a financial service when they see it working with OvertimeOvertime Audience Study on Finance, 2025
GamingOT gamers are 2x more likely than Gen Pop to spend over $250 a year on gaming (including games, consoles, controllers, and more)Overtime Audience Study on Gaming, 2023
Gaming ConsolesWhile 93% of OT gamers currently own a gaming device, over 1/4 plan on purchasing one or upgrading their current devices oonOvertime Audience Study on Gaming, 2023
Grocery Shopping65% of OT fans like to shop at multiple stores, shopping at an average of over 4 different grocery stores, 1.6x more than Gen PopOvertime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, 2024
Grocery Shopping64% of OT fans spend over $250 per month on groceries for their household, where nearly half of those fans spend over $500 per monthOvertime Audience Study on Grocery Shopping, 2024
GroomingMale OT fans are 1.8x more likely to spend more on nicer grooming productsOvertime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025
HolidayOver half of Overtime fans are likely to spend over $500 on gifts, a 163 index to Gen PopOvertime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024
HolidayVideo games, clothing, electronics, sneakers, games are the five most popular items that OT fans are likely to purchase this holiday seasonOvertime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024
HolidayOT fans overindex most on purchasing sports equipment (327 index), sports memorabilia & merchandise (302 index) and charitable donations (260 index)Overtime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024
Holiday85% of OT fans looks for the best deals when holiday shopping, where quality and price are the most important factorsOvertime Audience Study on Holiday Shopping, 2024
Investing76% of OT fans are at least moderately knowledgeable about investing, where nearly half are investing between $25K and $100K each yearOvertime Audience Study on Finance, 2025
JuiceWhile 8 in 10 OT fans purchase juice at a grocery store, they are over 3.5x more likely to purchase it online (355 index)Overtime Audience Study on Beverages, 2023
ParentingOT Parents are most likely to purchase clothes/sneakers, video games, or snacks for their children (8 in 10)Overtime Audience Study on Parenting, 2024
Payment MethodsOT fans are most likely to use credit cards (52%) and debit cards (51%) when paying for thingsOvertime Audience Study on Finance, 2025
Payment MethodsOT fans are frequent users of digital payment methods, and plan to use them in the future, where the most popular systems include PayPal (85%), Cash App (74%) and Google Pay (68%)Overtime Audience Study on Finance, 2025
Payment MethodsOT fans are more likely than Gen Pop to use Buy Now, Pay Later platforms, where Afterpay (55%, 277 index), Klara (47%, 312 index) and Affirm (45%, 288 index) are most commonly usedOvertime Audience Study on Finance, 2025
Personal CareOT fans are nearly 3.5x more likely to spend over $100 per month on personal care productsOvertime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025
Personal CareOver 7 in 10 OT fans tend to purchase the same personal care products, rather than trying new onesOvertime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025
Personal CareOT fans are over 4.6x more likely to shop for personal care products via social media, but over 75% tend to do most of their shopping at Walmart, Target, or AmazonOvertime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025
Personal Care72% of OT fans would be more interested in a personal care brand or product if they saw it working with OvertimeOvertime Audience Study on Personal Care, 2025
PodcastsOT fans are very likely to consider purchasing products & services from hearing about them through podcast advertising, a 338 index compared to Gen PopOvertime Audience Study on Podcasts, 2023
Pre-Packaged Food & BeveragesOT fans are nearly 3x more likely than Gen Pop to purchase pre-packaged food and beverages in person, although 70% typically purchase in-personOvertime Audience Study on Pre-Packaged Food & Beverages, 2025
QSR71% of OT fans spend under $30 per person at fast food restaurantsOvertime Audience Study on QSR and Dining, 2023
QSR (Pizza)89% of OT fans purchase pizza at least a few times per month; 53% purchase pizza at least once a weekOvertime Custom Brand Lift Study, 2023
Retail82% of OT fans are the primary shopper for their apparel, shoes, and accessoriesOvertime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024
RetailOver 8 in 10 OT fans shop for apparel monthly (175 index to Gen Pop)Overtime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024
RetailApproximately 6 in 10 OT fans spend over $100 per month each on apparel and shoes, which is 1.5-2x more than Gen PopOvertime Audience Study on Apparel & Sneakers, 2024
Seltzer70% of OT fans typically purchase seltzer/sparkling water at a grocery storeOvertime Audience Study on Beverages, 2023

ShoppingWalmart is the #1 place for OT fans to shop for discount items, where 3/4 of fans go to Walmart multiple times a monthOvertime Audience Study on Walmart, 2022
ShoppingOT fans are 2x more likely to purchase products recommended by influencers or athletes (207 index)Overtime Audience Study on Shopping, 2025

SnacksOT fans are nearly 2x more likely than Gen Pop to purchase a snack when they see it advertised in sportsOvertime Audience Study on Snacks, 2024
Snacks91% of OT fans agree that when they find a certain snack they like, they keep buying itOvertime Audience Study on Snacks, 2024
Snacks x ChildrenOT parents are most likely to purchase fruit (89%), chips (84%) or fruit snacks (83%) for their childrenOvertime Audience Study on Parenting, 2024
Social Media PurchasesOT fans are over 7.5x more likely to purchase products through social media weekly or more often (754 index)Overtime Audience Study 2024
SodaOT fans are 2.5x more likely to purchase soda online, and 1.7x more likely to purchase it at a sporting event, as compared to Gen PopOvertime Audience Study on Beverages, 2023
Sports/Energy Drinks68% of OT fans typically purchase sports or energy drinks at convenience stores, which is the #1 location where these beverages are purchasedOvertime Audience Study on Beverages, 2023
Streaming63% of OT fans subscribe to 3 or more streaming services on their ownOvertime Audience Study on Streaming, 2024
StreamingPrice is the number one factor that influences OT fans when picking a streaming service, followed by TV Show/Movie availability and quality; OT fans are 3x more likely to pick one based on the ability to watch sportsOvertime Audience Study on Streaming, 2024
Streaming91% of OT fans would be likely to try a streaming service if it offered a discounted priceOvertime Audience Study on Streaming, 2024
